mapper.select: select count(cid) from auto_warehouseDB.cargo where sid=#{sid} and suid=#{suid} and state="not expire";
mapper.insert: insert into auto_warehouseDB.cargo (sid, sname, productionDate, shelfLife, state, suid) values (#{sid}, #{sname}, #{productionDate}, #{shelfLife}, #{state}, #{suid});
mapper.update: update auto_warehouseDB.cargo set outputTime=#{outputTime} where cid=#{cid};
update auto_warehouseDB.cargo set state="expire" where outputTime is null and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, productionDate, NOW())>=shelfLife;
mapper.select: select suid from auto_warehouseDB.cargo where cid = #{cid};
